body_html:
The only thing I'm not sure of is my step
ln -sf /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcudart.so.8.0 /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcudart.so.7.5
before compiling tensorflow, because otherwise the compilation fails...

body:
The only thing I'm not sure of is my step
`ln -sf /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcudart.so.8.0 /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcudart.so.7.5`
before compiling tensorflow, because otherwise the compilation fails...
